screen_desc: This is a mobile screenshot of a sorting and filtering menu page on the Crate and Barrel website. It features options to change the view of products, and sorting criteria such as "Most Relevant," "Price, low to high," "Price, high to low," "Top Rated," and "New," with "Top Rated" currently selected. Additional options to filter by "COLLECTIONS" and "TYPE" are shown but not expanded. At the bottom, there's a prompt to "Add Crate to Home screen," suggesting a feature to create a shortcut for this website on the device's home screen.

action_result:
By clicking on the close icon "X" of the "Add Crate to Home screen" pop-up window, the screen is now free of the pop-up, which allows for better interaction with the content on the page. This action has removed the distraction from the bottom of the screen, so you can now focus on browsing the products.

As for the user request to check the best-rated table lamp on Crate and Barrel, the filter is already set to "Top Rated," which is directly aligned with the task. However, further action is needed to apply the filter, which can be done by pressing the "APPLY" button at the bottom of the screen. Once applied, the products will be sorted by their rating, allowing you to find the best-rated table lamp.

This action has made progress towards the user request by removing the pop-up, but the filter still needs to be applied to refine the results.
